=> Step 1: 	Find a blank space where you wish to place the widget

 => Step 2: 	Press and hold on the blank space, then tap Widgets

 => Step 3: 	Select the widget MODERN IGBO CALENDER and press and hold its

 => Step 4: 	Release the widget in the free space



The widget is now displayed

=> Step 1: 	Touch and hold on an empty space on the Home screen

 => Step 2: 	Touch the Widgets button at the bottom of the screen

 => Step 3: 	Touch and hold on the widget MODERN IGBO CALENDER

 => Step 4: 	Position the widget on the screen and release it to add it to the Home screen

 => Step 5: 	Release the widget in the free space



If the widget is too large you will receive the following message: "No more room on this page." The device will then attempt to place the widget on a Home screen that has the necessary space.
